title: Potential glitch? Couldn't get to champ select after AFK check

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Instead I stared at this until the screen when back to the regular home screen with that "retrieving data" staying on until I closed the client. I logged back on and had a Leaverbuster on me. What happened?

replies.body:
It appears your PC wasn't able to establish a connection to the champ select server and your client didn't toss you in the champ select after you accepted the match. There are a number of local network configurations or routing issues that could cause this to happen, but our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start in solving this.

If you continue to have issues after working through that guide, please let me know.
